messages.message:
Hey everyone, as we've grown the platform and features, we've also seen significant growth in the number of services we have as part of the Instabase platform, as well as services with increasingly complex resource requirements. This presents a number of challenges both for us and for our customers and is adversely affecting our scalability and performance. We've put together a doc detailing some thoughts around this and how we can better consolidate and run our services. PTAL and provide thoughts/feedback!

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sdAMsf89czOQOFBdsnFkyUS-ZpZfjzdtYjDkkYey1to
